title: White House Accuses Moscow Of Violating Landmark Arms Control Deal
teaser: The Obama administration is accusing Russia of testing a banned cruise missile, thus violating a long-standing treaty that helped put an end to the Cold War. To learn more about the situation, Audie Cornish speaks with Steven Pifer, the director of the Arms Control and Non-Proliferation Initiative at the Brookings Institution.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
